subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: For 14 games, the Oklahoma City Thunder discovered what life was like without Russell Westbrook and Kevin Durant in the lineup: unpleasant. But the benefit is that the second unit has become more self-reliant.
snippet: For 14 games, the Oklahoma City Thunder discovered what life was like without Russell Westbrook and Kevin Durant in the lineup: unpleasant. But the benefit is that the second unit has become more self-reliant.
